alert.note: Alert for Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 22 at 7:05AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Passaic, central Bergen and north central Essex Counties through 745 AM EDT... At 705 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Wayne, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paterson, Wayne, Paramus, Ridgewood, Ramsey, Caldwell, Hawthorne, Oradell, Fairfield, Fair Lawn, Elmwood Park, Dumont, Wyckoff, New Milford and Little Falls. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Bergen; Eastern Passaic; Western Bergen
